ModMetaData.name: [KYD] Igor Raid Mechanics for All Storytellers
ModMetaData.author: Kayedon, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the raid mechanics from Igor Invader to all storytellers.
- Damage is multiplied by a set value. - Threats don't fire under a chosen population threshold. - Losing pawns in a raid triggers reinforcements. - Beating a raid triggers user-defined events. - Optional and adjustable raid warning.
